attributes.action: MP's to respect the DEMOCRATIC result of The EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
MP's are elected democratically, thus should respect the result of the majority of the electorate. 
If any MP cannot support the British Government with the negotiations of the departure of Great Britain from the European Union, they should not hold office. They are disputing the democratic result, a fundamental system which our country is based upon.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon HM Government to implement a rule that a democratic vote must be respected and accepted by every MP. All MP's actively or publicly blocking the EU Referendum result should be removed from post.
